There is a train service from
(8 minutes) every half an hour. A bus service to Weiterstadt and Darmstadt-Wixhausen is also available. Connection to Motorways A5 via Weiterstadt, to A661 via Egelsbach.

value: The protestant church is more than 1000 years old, but cannot be visited. Some of the timbered houses in the old part of the town are pretty nice as well.
Some people who visit Erzhausen come for the Sauna
. Choose between five saunas between 60 and 100°C, massage, aroma studio, solarium and many other options. 2 h for 14 €, whole day 19 € per adult.

Erzhausen has a few nice Restaurants. The "Zur Linde" right in the center of the town has excellent traditional German food at reasonable prices. But service is not very fast though. A very good Greek restaurant is right at the train station.
is an excellent hotel and also a very good option for business travellers to Darmstadt and Frankfurt.
